summary: A wisecracking New York reporter intrudes on a research scientist's quest to unmask The Moon Killer.
cast: Lionel Atwill|Fay Wray|Lee Tracy|Preston Foster|John Wray|Harry Beresford|Arthur Edmund Carewe|Leila Bennett|Robert Warwick|George Rosener|Willard Robertson|Thomas E. Jackson|Harry Holman|Mae Busch|Tom Dugan|Louise Beavers|Raoul Freeman|Selmer Jackson|Charles McMurphy|Ky Robinson
title: El doctor X
